title: How to restart the Connector
text: Push the small power button until the blue light goes off – about 20 seconds. Then push it again to start the connector again. To remotely reboot a connector SSH/Putty into it and run "sudo reboot".
description:
Push the small power button until the blue light goes off – about 20 seconds. Then push it again to start the connector again. 

 

 

To remotely reboot a connector SSH/Putty into it and run "sudo reboot".

title: Customer display on 2nd monitor
text: If the customer would like the customer display to be automatically on the correct monitor when starting up you could do the following: First click on any empty spot on your desktop and click on Display Settings. Identify which monitor is your customer display and remember this for later. Go to POS ADMIN > POS Options > Customer Display > And select either monitor 1 or 2 (or higher) depending which one is your customer display.
description:
If the customer would like the customer display to be automatically on the correct monitor when starting up you could do the following: 

 

First click on any empty spot on your desktop and click on Display Settings.  

 

Identify which monitor is your customer display and remember this for later. 

 

Go to POS ADMIN > POS Options > Customer Display > And select either monitor 1 or 2 (or higher) depending which one is your customer display.
